name: myhrer-bc-docs
description: This extenion makes the life as a documentation writer more easy. this extension adds functions to setup and create and update DocFX files.

commands.title: MYH: Create and Update DocFX files
MYH: Create And Update DocFX Toc And Index files
MYH: Initilize Repository For Use With DocFX

myhrer-bc-docs.MediaFolder.description: the name of the folder for resource images

myhrer-bc-docs.LogoFileName.description: the name of the logo file in the image resource folder

myhrer-bc-docs.DocFXOutputFolder.description: The name of the outputfolder for DocFX to write files to

myhrer-bc-docs.CreteTableOfContents.description: Create table of contents in beginning of the PDF document.

myhrer-bc-docs.CreatePDFCoverPage.description: Create coverpage on the first page of the PDF.

myhrer-bc-docs.CoverPageFileName.description: The name of the cover page template file

myhrer-bc-docs.UseFolderAsPdfFilename.description: Will use the folder as filename for the PDF.

myhrer-bc-docs.CreatePdfHeader.description: Create header text in the PDF.

myhrer-bc-docs.CreatePdfHeaderTemplateTe.description: File that containes the header template data.

myhrer-bc-docs.CreatePdfFooter.description: Create footer text in the PDF.

myhrer-bc-docs.CreatePdfFooterTemplateTe.description: File that containes the footer template data.

scripts.pretest: npm run compile && npm run lint
